allergyTypes.name: Dairy
allergyTypes.description: Allergic to milk and dairy products.

allergyTypes.name: Gluten
allergyTypes.description: Allergic to gluten-containing grains like wheat, barley, and rye.

allergyTypes.name: Nuts
allergyTypes.description: Allergic to tree nuts or peanuts.

allergyTypes.name: Eggs
allergyTypes.description: Allergic to eggs and egg-containing products.

allergyTypes.name: Sesame
allergyTypes.description: Allergic to sesame seeds and sesame-based products.
